title: Optimizing Conversion Rates by Working on Just One Page. Genius or Madness?
description: Do you ever feel overwhelmed by all the CRO things you could be working on? Why not just limit everything you do to a single page... Would that even work?
show_notes:
• Here is the room air purifier test where Rishi added the two buttons "I have 2 minutes" and "I have time" buttons and saw a 30.56% lift. Here are my other case studies: https://www.frictionless-commerce.com/case-studies/
  • Air purifier PDP: https://oransi.com/products/oransi-ej-air-purifier?variant=37157370790069
  • Zipf's law
